User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.41 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

I have an IMAP connection to my Google Apps (or GMail) account.  I deleted a label in GMail.


Actual results:

The label disappeared from GMail, but the folder in Thunderbird was still visible.  Upon going to the folder in Thunderbird, I get an error notification saying something along the lines of "[NONEXISTENT] Unknown Mailbox: [label] (Failure)."


Expected results:

The folder should have disappeared from view in Thunderbird.
